abomination.title: Abomination
abomination.name: Bigby
abomination.summary: A tormented shapeshifter cursed with eldritch powers. Bigby struggles to control the monstrous force within him, oscillating between his human form and a terrifying bestial transformation. His tragic past and internal conflict make him a dangerous but potentially powerful ally.
abomination.history: Beaten, branded, and imprisoned for untold decades, Bigby eventually escaped his confinement. He carries the burden of an eldritch curse that gives him immense power at a terrible cost. The scars of his imprisonment and the constant battle with his inner demon have shaped him into a conflicted and dangerous individual.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.accessories: Chains wrapped around torso and arms

strengths: Immense physical strength in beast form

notes: Fears losing control and harming allies

antiquarian.title: Antiquarian
antiquarian.name: Josephine
antiquarian.summary: The Antiquarian is a cunning and morally ambiguous character driven by an insatiable greed for valuable artifacts and occult knowledge. Her pursuit of power and wealth leads her to dark places, both literally and figuratively. She has arrived at the estate to pilfer the Ancestor's relics, and in search of the final piece of a mysterious puzzle box.
antiquarian.history: Originally from the East, the Antiquarian has traveled the world trading in supernatural relics. She became a disciple to a sorcerer to advance her knowledge of the arcane, only to betray and imprison him in a censer during a ritual. Her past is marked by self-serving decisions and a willingness to sacrifice others for her goals.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.accessories: Orange scarf covering lower face, multiple necklaces

notes: Possesses a censer containing her former master's soul
Driven beyond all else to open her puzzle box
Her former master occasionally whispers to her, trying to escape

arbalest.title: Arbalest
arbalest.name: Missandei
arbalest.summary: A skilled crossbowwoman with a tragic past, the Arbalest is a survivor who has honed her skills with the arbalest through years of hardship and adventure. Her quest for wealth is driven by a deeper search for a home she may never find.
arbalest.history: After a violent attack on her home that killed her father, the Arbalest was forced to flee with only a crossbow for protection. She has since traveled widely, serving as a mercenary, and has developed exceptional skills with her weapon and knowledge of herbal medicine.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.hairStyle: Braids tied up in a short upright ponytail

clothing.accessories: Gauntlet on one hand and glove on the other

notes: Cannot accurately remember the traumatic events of her childhood

bounty_hunter.title: Bounty Hunter
bounty_hunter.name: Tardif
bounty_hunter.summary: A ruthless and professional bounty hunter who takes pride in his work. The Bounty Hunter is a skilled fighter, motivated primarily by profit and self-interest. His cynical worldview and loner tendencies suggest a dark past that he refuses to talk about.
bounty_hunter.history: While his past is a well-guarded secret, The Bounty Hunter has clearly lived a life of violence and danger. He's honed his skills as a bounty hunter, becoming a calculated and efficient killer who specializes in identifying weak points and executing targets.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.headwear: Metallic mask with cloth covering face

notes: Takes pride in his professional skills
Refuses to remove his mask and let anyone see his face

cataphract.title: Cataphract
cataphract.name: Nyriad & Cargadon
cataphract.summary: The Cataphract is a formidable mounted warrior from the Levantine Sultanate, bonded with her supernatural horse. Together they form an unstoppable cavalry unit, using their combined skills to charge into battle and vanquish foes.
cataphract.history: Once a respected warrior of the Levantine Sultanate, the Cataphract's life changed when her beloved horse was fatally wounded. Desperate, she stole a powerful artifact to revive him, resulting in their exile. Now the spirit of the horse speaks to her, and they fight together against the horrors of the estate.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Angular facial structure and prominent cheekbones

notes: Carries the skull of her deceased horse, which grants her power
Can communicate with the horse's spirit

cook.title: Itinerant Cook
cook.name: Gertrude
cook.summary: The Itinerant Cook is an elderly, but strong woman. She is an experienced and world-wise traveling cook. Pragmatic and sometimes cynical, she excels in her culinary skills and firmly believes in the power of good food. She's resourceful, adaptable, and has faced numerous challenges in her long life.
cook.history: The Itinerant Cook has spent her life working across a wide range of settings from high-end kitchens to makeshift camp setups. Her travels have exposed her to diverse and often dangerous situations, which she has consistently survived. She has a dark side to her expertise, including knowledge of luring and slaughtering both beasts and people.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: White eyebrows, age lines, defined cheekbones

notes: Carries an enourmous backpack with cooking supplies
Known for creating unusual but effective dishes from strange ingredients

crusader.title: Crusader
crusader.name: Reynauld
crusader.summary: The Crusader, rose from a common conscript to a champion of over 100 holy wars. Transformed by the horrors of battle and church abuse, he abandoned his family, unable to face them. Now seeking redemption, he's drawn to the estate to combat unholy forces, haunted by memories of his past life.
crusader.history: Once a common man conscripted into the holy war, the Crusader left behind a wife and young son. Rising through the ranks, he became a champion and army leader. The wars and church changed him profoundly, hollowing him out and turning him into a zealous warrior for the light. Unable to return to his family, he vowed to live his remaining days as a Crusader.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

crusader.magic: The light, a divine power that lets him smite foes and heal allies.
notes: Has an irresistible kleptomania.

Heiress.description: Reynauld maintains a professional relationship with the Heiress, focusing on fulfilling his role as her protector with a devout sense of duty.

Heir.description: While Reynauld intends to uphold his duty with silent diligence, the realises the meek Heir is unfit to lead.

Highwayman.description: The Crusader sees in the Highwayman a kindred spirit; both men with troubled pasts seeking to carve out a purpose through the quest they now share.

duchess.title: Duchess
duchess.name: Constance
duchess.summary: A noblewoman turned monster, the Duchess is a formidable fencer who has embraced the Crimson Curse inflicted upon her by the Countess. She now seeks vengeance against the curse-inflicted court, particularly the Countess, while finding an uneasy alliance with the Heirs and fighters of the Hamlet.
duchess.history: Born into nobility, Constance lived a life of luxury and became the court's finest fencer. She developed a rivalry with the Countess, who later disappeared for years. Upon receiving an invitation to a party in the Ancestor's courtyard along with a chalice of blood, Constance became infected with the Crimson Curse. Now transformed, she seeks revenge against the Baron, the Viscount, and especially the Countess.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

equipment: Tattered dress reinforced with iron plates

clothing.headwear: Large, angular helmet that hides everything but her toothy mouth

notes: Finds comfort in her monstrous form
Considers her beast form more representative of her true self
Struggles with an insatiable hunger

flagellant.title: Flagellant
flagellant.name: Damien
flagellant.summary: A zealous devotee who finds power and religious ecstasy through self-inflicted pain. Once a vagrant, Damien discovered his calling after a violent encounter, leading him to dedicate his life to suffering as a form of worship and atonement.
flagellant.history: Formerly a destitute wanderer in the city, Damien's life changed when he was attacked by drunks. The pain awakened a fervent religious conviction within him, leading him to join the clergy and later seek out suffering as a form of spiritual enlightenment.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Believes his pain can absolve others of their sins

grave_robber.title: Grave Robber
grave_robber.name: Audrey
grave_robber.summary: Once a noblewoman, the Grave Robber turned to grave robbing after murdering her abusive husband. She's a skilled assassin, specializing in quick, precise attacks and evading danger. Her past has left her with a cynical outlook, but she's found a new purpose in her dangerous profession.
grave_robber.history: Born into wealth and married for status, the Grave Robber endured years of abuse from her drunken, lustful husband. She eventually poisoned him, then robbed his grave to maintain her lifestyle. When faced with eviction due to debt, she fully embraced her new identity as a grave robber and fled her former life.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Mole on upper lip, pointy chin

clothing.top: Blue fitted jacket with puffy shoulders

notes: Has a gallows sense of humor

heiress.title: Heiress
heiress.name: Persephone Dantill
heiress.summary: The Heiress to the accursed Estate, excels at taking command in even the most daunting situations. With her sharp intellect and strategic prowess, she fearlessly leads the charge to reclaim her ancestral home while deftly managing the nearby hamlet. Her natural authority and decisive leadership serve as a beacon of strength for a community besieged by supernatural horrors. Though grateful for allies brave enough to join her cause, Persephone's unwavering confidence in her own judgment can manifest as stubborn resistance when her authority is challenged.
heiress.history: Upon receiving a chilling letter from her late ancestor, the Heiress left her academic pursuits with her brother in tow to take up her role as the Heiress of the Estate. She found herself thrust into a nightmarish reality where her ancestral home was not only physically deteriorated but also infested with the horrors summoned by her ancestor's dark rituals.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.hairStyle: Tied up in a bun and with curly bangs

clothing.head: Hair needle
clothing.body: Marine blue robe over white shirt

notes: Turns to wine when overwhelmed by the stress of managing the Hamlet.
Attracted to women with ample breasts.

Heir.description: Despite a cold exterior and lifetime of bickering, the Heiress loves and will not let harm come upon the Heir.

Crusader.description: The Heiress maintains a reserved, professional demeanor towards the Crusader, her latest recruit.

Highwayman.description: The Heiress regards the Highwayman with suspicion. While his skills could prove valuable, his checkered past and gruff manner keep her on guard.

highwayman.title: Highwayman
highwayman.name: Dismas
highwayman.summary: Once a prisoner, the Highwayman is now a haunted fugitive, living off the squalor of the city's canals and the meager pickings from vermin. His vision of freedom has been replaced by a reality of degradation, driving him to reluctantly offer his services for a final, desperate heist. Now, his path has unexpectedly converged with that of the Heiress and the Heir, offering a precarious chance at redemption through service.
highwayman.history: The Highwayman's tale is one of escape and survival, painted with strokes of desperation and grim resolve. Escaping from incarceration during a prison riot, he sought refuge in the underbelly of the city, subsisting in conditions that stripped away his illusions of freedom. A final job, taken out of sheer necessity, ended in tragedy, leaving him with a burden of guilt that no distance can alleviate.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

clothing.head: Red scarf
clothing.body: Rugged grey coat with fur collar

notes: Known to cheat at cards
Has a gallows sense of humor

Heiress.description: The Highwayman is determined to prove himself to the Heiress and to assist in her quest despite her warranted distrust.

Heir.description: Despite the Heir's distrust, the Highwayman is resolute in his role as a guard, seeing their safety as his path to absolution.

Crusader.description: Despite their outwardly differences, the Highwayman and Crusader swiftly bonded over the mistakes of their respective pasts and quest for redemption.

hood.title: Hood
hood.name: Tilly
hood.summary: The Hood is a strange and enigmatic child who, stumlbing, chases around her imaginary-or are they real?-cat and butterfly companions and talking nonsense to herself. She is unsettling in her childish ways and soft nonsensical words, but she has an unnatural sense of finding lost things and ability to convenient dodge out of danger at the perfect moment.
hood.history: The Hood was seen as unnerving by those around her, talking to herself with a complete disregard for anyone else, save for the occasional unnerving comment. Voluptuous yet cherubic for her young age and unwanted by her family, she was sent to serve at the Hamlet's brothel. Due to her total lack of reaction, she was kicked out and now again roams the streets following her ethereal friends.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Soft, cherubic features, smooth skin, full chest, freckles

notes: Her nonsensical monologues often seems to circle back to her grandmother.
Rarely says anything even remotely relevant to what she responds to.

houndmaster.title: Houndmaster
houndmaster.name: William & Fergus
houndmaster.summary: The Houndmaster is a former lawman who now fights alongside his faithful wolfhound, Fergus. Together they form a formidable team, using their skills to track down enemies and protect their allies.
houndmaster.history: Once a dedicated member of law enforcement, the Houndmaster uncovered corruption within his ranks. This discovery led him to leave his post and seek justice in his own way, with Fergus as his loyal companion.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Carries dog treats to boost his companion's abilities
His dog is adept at scouting and keeping watch

hqclaimants.title: Claimants
hqclaimants.name: Cordelia & Cassius
hqclaimants.summary: The Claimants, are a pair of ambitious siblings seeking to reclaim their lost lineage in a distant land. Adept in both combat and sorcery, they combine their varied skills to support allies and vanquish foes. Their unique tactics allow them to act as both a single unit and individuals, making them unpredictable and versatile on the battlefield.
hqclaimants.history: Driven from their ancestral home in a far-off land, the Claimants have journeyed to the Ancestor's estate seeking forbidden knowledge and eldritch secrets. Their ultimate goal is to amass enough power and uncover crucial information that will enable them to reclaim their own lost birthright and restore their family's glory in their homeland. The mysteries left behind by the Ancestor are but stepping stones in their ambitious quest.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Striking blue eyes, bold red lips/Full well-groomed beard

notes: Act as both a single unit and as individuals in combat
Possess unique 'Brother' and 'Sister' actions
Can combine varied skill sets in the same turn

kheir.title: Heir
kheir.name: Percival Dantill
kheir.summary: The Heir to the estate is a brilliant scholar and capable manager who is desperately trying to cope in this world of horrors far beyond his comfort. Despite being a man of cowardice and meek nature, Percival's keen intellect and organizational skills prove invaluable in coordinating the chaotic efforts to reclaim his ancestral home.
kheir.history: Raised in academic circles far from the estate's dark legacy, Percival was reluctantly drawn into the family's quest by his sister. Despite his initial hesitation, he's found ways to apply his scholarly knowledge and managerial expertise to the daunting task at hand.

status.description: In good health and high spitits

notes: Hates waste and is very possesive of his belongings
Has a penchant for fine wines to calm his nerves

Heiress.description: Percival admires, and is deeply jealous of, his sister's strength and ability to take initiave. Despite their fierce bickering, The Heir loves his sister.

Crusader.description: Though he recognizes his potential, The Heir is dubious over the trustworthiness of his new guard, the Crusader.

Highwayman.description: The Heir is distrusting towards the Highwayman, scared that the rugged man will betray them and steal his possessions.

krakenslayer.title: Krakenslayer
krakenslayer.name: Hilda
krakenslayer.summary: A seasoned and fearless monster hunter of the seas, Hilda is known for her unparalleled skill in slaying krakens and other maritime beasts. Her rugged demeanor and battle-hardened experience make her a formidable ally in any nautical adventure.
krakenslayer.history: Hilda has spent years hunting dangerous sea creatures, accumulating a wealth of experience and numerous scars. Her body is adorned with tattoos commemorating her most significant kills, each one a testament to her prowess as a hunter.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Tattoos on arms, chest, and neck

clothing.accessories: Gold ring earring, chain necklace with shark teeth

notes: Has numerous tattoos commemorating her kills
Known for her accent and occasional nautical idioms

musketeer.title: Musketeer
musketeer.name: Margaret
musketeer.summary: The Musketeer is a skilled sharpshooter from a noble family that is related to the Ancestor and his Dantill family. Her encounter with an eldritch eye during a crucial competition has left her both traumatized, humiliated, and driven to seek out revenge among the otherworldly prey of the Estate.
musketeer.history: Born into wealth, Margaret learned hunting and shooting from her father, a survivor of 'the lost jungle'. After a traumatic experience during a shooting competition where she saw an eldritch eye, she began seeking more dangerous prey, eventually coming to the Estate to hunt otherworldly creatures.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Has a family connections to the Ancestor
Proficient in first aid

occultist.title: Occultist
occultist.name: Alhazred
occultist.summary: A powerful occultist who has delved deep into forbidden knowledge and eldritch powers. Alhazred has performed rituals that have left him forever changed, serving as a conduit to unknown regions and constantly assailed by blasphemous forces. His pursuit of arcane wisdom and impossible power has come at a great cost, both to himself and those around him.
occultist.history: Alhazred conducted rituals to explore the Outer Sphere, found a mysterious pyramid in a desert that changed everything, sacrificed parts of himself for power, and ultimately became a beacon for eldritch entities. His apotheosis was achieved through dangerous rituals and communion with forces beyond mortal comprehension.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Constantly hears whispers from eldritch entities
Has sacrificed parts of himself for power

offering.title: Offering
offering.name: Lulu
offering.summary: Driven by a morbid fascination with mortality, the Offering shields her allies while seeking to understand the fragility of life. Her helpless, vulnerable getup renders her powerless to stop the violations she eagerly welcomes unto herself from friend and foe alike, in order to experience the depths of agony, suffering, and desperation.
offering.history: Born into a secluded cult and groomed for sacrifice, the Offering's fate took a cruel twist when an eldritch entity rejected her, instead taking her heart and replacing it with another's - one that carried the memories of a young abused girl. Left with an empty chest and overwhelmed by newfound empathy and pain, the Offering fled her cult. She now walks a precarious path between life and death, driven to understand and share in others' suffering.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

equipment: Heart levitating behind her, wrapped in chains
notes: Her arms are tightly bound together and unusable below her chest
The gag in her mouth renders her unable to speak

omenseeker.title: Omen Seeker
omenseeker.name: Mesmira
omenseeker.summary: The Omen Seeker is a nomadic inquisitor and monster hunter from the Levantine Sultanate, devoted to 'the Flame.' She's a complex individual, balancing unwavering conviction with deep-seated guilt over past actions. Stern and disciplined, she wields an arsenal of specialized weapons to combat supernatural threats.
omenseeker.history: The Omen Seeker's past involves violent acts against communities, which continue to haunt her. She travels with a well-stocked wagon, serving as both her mobile home and a base of operations. While dedicated to her mission of purging evil, she grapples with the morality of her methods and the weight of lives taken in the name of her faith.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.pants: Flowing skirt with high slit and thighhighs
clothing.accessories: Multiple necklaces, large earrings, arm bracers

notes: Travels with a well-stocked wagon
Skilled in divination
Possesses extensive knowledge of monsters

plague_doctor.title: Plague Doctor
plague_doctor.name: Paracelsus
plague_doctor.summary: The Plague Doctor, is primarily driven by her fervor to practice medicine and unlock the secrets of life and death. Ostracized for her radical methods, she now makes use of the Heirs' resources, offering her medical expertise on missions in return for the freedom to conduct her experiments at the hamlet.
plague_doctor.history: Once a top student embroiled in scandal due to her unconventional theories, the Plague Doctor's intense curiosity pushed her beyond academic boundaries. Her breakthrough came when she revived the cadaver of her deceased professor during an unauthorized experiment. Haunted by the consequences of her actions, she was compelled to leave her former life behind, seeking refuge and opportunity in the shadows of the hamlet's resources.

status.description: In good health and decent spirits

appearance.hairStyle: Short bob with slight flip at ends
appearance.features: angular face with soft features, large chest

clothing.top: Green coat with spiked leather pauldrons

notes: Struggles with ethical boundaries in her pursuit of knowledge

ringmaster.title: Ringmaster
ringmaster.name: Maul
ringmaster.summary: The Ringmaster is the charismatic and ruthless leader of the infamous traveling fighting arena: The Butcher's Circus. She delights in orchestrating spectacles of combat, pushing contestants to their limits for the entertainment of bloodthirsty crowds. Her elaborate costume and masked helm conceal a shrewd mind that's always calculating the next big show.
ringmaster.history: Rising from humble beginnings, the Ringmaster built her reputation through cunning and a flair for the dramatic. She transformed a small-time fighting pit into a renowned traveling arena, drawing both desperate warriors and thrill-seeking audiences from across the land.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.headwear: Ornate spiked helm with a single eye hole
clothing.accessories: Large bow tie, sleeves in mismatched colours

notes: Her mouth is often covered in blood, which everyone hopes is just part of her makeup.

seraph.title: Seraph
seraph.name: Joan
seraph.summary: A devout warrior who hears the voice of 'The Light', the Seraph has transformed from a humble farmer to a zealous crusader. Burned and scarred from a near-death experience, she now serves as a vessel for divine power, though the true nature of the entity guiding her remains ambiguous.
seraph.history: Born into poverty, the Seraph's life changed when she began hearing voices  from The Light. Believing herself chosen, she took up arms, causing a schism in the church. Hunted by witch hunter Mathis, she was captured and sentenced to burn. During her execution, a miraculous intervention saved her, though leaving her horribly scarred. Now, guided by the voice, she has come to the Hamlet to purge evil.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

notes: Hears voices claiming to be 'The Light'
Occasionally regrets leaving her simple life
Can momentarily manifest angelic wings

sisters.title: Sisters
sisters.name: Junjeong & Nammo
sisters.summary: The sisters are composed of The Scholar (the first name) and the Warrior (the second name), who are two souls bound to one body, which both claim to be the rightful owner of. The Scholar often maintains control, but the Warrior is able to seize autonomy of the body, primarily when there is blood to shed. Refer to them not as the combined sisters, but the Scholar or Warrior, depending on who is in control.
sisters.history: Orphaned by a powerful warlord, the sisters were trained in tactics and combat. After a victory celebration, the two sisters set out to kill the other and a massacre occurred, leaving one sister dead. Both claim to be the survivor and the other a parasitic spirit. They now seek the power at the Estate to rid themselves of the other.

status.description: In good health and high spirit

clothing.accessories: The spirit of the sister not in control hovers behind the body, their translucent form only rarely seen by the other heroes.

weaknesses: Limited access to inactive sister's skills

sisters.magic: Forbidden knowledge allowing manipulation of life essence
notes: The Sister's personality differs greatly depending on who is in control, expressing only the mannerisms of that sister
Both sisters act like the body is theirs, and introduce themselves and refer to it by their own name, acting as if the other sister doesn't exist
The inactive sister spectates as a detached, invisible spirit and has no influence over the word or actions of the body
In combat, the sister in control sometimes reluctantly relinquish it to take advantage of the other's strength

snor_rasp.title: Martyr
snor_rasp.name: Anastasia
snor_rasp.summary: The Martyr, is a devout follower of a pain-worshipping sect. Guarded by Yuzupov, she has near-immortality and uses a thorn whip in combat. Her presence is both an asset and liability, enduring suffering to protect others while seeking danger for her faith.
snor_rasp.history: The Martyr's extreme devotion caught Yuzupov's attention, granting her near-immortality. She now views the estate's horrors as a pilgrimage to test her faith and endurance.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.top: Frilly red dress with ruffled white collar

notes: Constantly seeks out pain and dangerous situations.
Finds pleasure in cutting, entangling, and strangling herself with her thorn whip

vestal.title: Vestal
vestal.name: Junia
vestal.summary: The Vestal, upheld her sacred duties with pious rigor within the Abbey's sheltered confines. Her life, once marked by the tranquility of clerical discipline, was disrupted when her neglect and daydreaming of forbidden desires caused the monastery's eternal light to fade, and she suffered under the harsh admonitions of her superiors. She now seeks redemption and freedom from her past torments through divine service in battle.
vestal.history: Raised within the Abbey's austere walls, the Vestal was the epitome of monastic discipline until a momentary lapse led to her unjust punishment. Imprisoned and tormented, she received a divine revelation that her captors had strayed from the true path. Rescued by radiant light, she now channels her zeal into protecting others, believing fervently in the Light's guidance and her role as its martial emissary.

status.description: In good health and decent spirits

vestal.magic: Powerful healing and protection spells as well as the ability to smite enemies with holy light.

wretch.title: Wretch
wretch.name: Yersin
wretch.summary: A disgraced aristocrat turned pauper, the Wretch has become a walking plague after years of hardship. He spreads blight and commands hordes of rats, using disease as his weapon. Though dangerous, the Wretch is unpredictable and cowardly, prone to fleeing or sacrificing allies to save himself.
wretch.history: Once a nobleman, the Wretch fell from grace and has since lived a life of poverty and disease. His years on the streets have taught him to survive by any means necessary, including embracing the very filth and pestilence that society shuns.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

appearance.features: Patchy beard, tumor-like growths on skull

notes: Commands a horde of rats he affectionately calls his 'pretties'
His favorite rat, who rides on his shoulder, is named Nicodemus

zenith.title: Zenith
zenith.name: Syndoriel
zenith.summary: The Zenith is an acrobatic fighter who inspires allies with his charm and skill with a spear. Sworn to a god of honor and brotherhood, he uses bravado to distract from horrors. He can unleash the Golden Janissary Style for powerful combinations against eldritch and unholy foes. Unarmored but mobile, his hedonistic nature may clash with the pious or those with jealous spouses.
zenith.history: The Zenith grew up in Great Forks, the City of a Thousand Temples, where he honed his charm and social skills. He trained rigorously with a near-forgotten order, mastering the art of fighting creatures of darkness. A tragic event involving the death of his friend Keli drives his actions. This past failure fuels his determination to protect others and redeem himself through his current adventures.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

weaknesses: Low durability due to lack of armor

notes: Carries guilt over past failure involving Keli
Skilled in lifting spirits and social interactions
Fighting style described as dance-like
